Contributor: Britton, L. N., artist.; W. F. Powers Co. Litho., lithographer.;
Note: Signed "L.N. Britton." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that the Navy is calling for you to enlist now. Illustration shows a giant eagle with an American emblem and five sailors standing below it.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: New York : W.F. Powers Co. Litho.,

Title: The Navy is calling
